0.NAME: How to mine XGC?
0.VALUE:
• Sign up on [Xiglute]({homeURL}).

• All actions like liking, comment, upload photos and videos, play [social games]({socialGamesURL}), add friends and [much more]({faqURL} 'Link to all possible actions and their limits') generate an internal currency called Xiglute Points (XP).

ㅤ• Examples:
ㅤㅤ• **Like:** `{likeXP, number} XP`
ㅤㅤ• **Upload Photo:** `{photoXP, number} XPs`
ㅤㅤ• **Upload Video:** `{videoXP, number} XPs`
ㅤㅤ• **Comment:** `{commentXP, number} XPs`

ㅤ• When you reach `{minimumXP, number} XPs`, you can request the exchange for XGC!
ㅤㅤ• `{minimumXP, number} XPs` ≈ `{priceInXGC, number, ::currency/USD}` in XGC on today's quote.

0.NAME: What is XGC?
0.VALUE: • Xiglute Coin is a cryptocurrency created by [Xiglute]({xigluteURL}), a social network with more than 22 million users around the world, which aims to replace the Xiglute Points (internal currency) that circulate on the social network since 2013.

1.NAME: Safety
1.VALUE: • Blockchain encryption system [Etherscan]({etherscanURL}), the safest on the market.

2.NAME: Coin Burning Plan
2.VALUE:
• One of the most aggressive plans on the market.

ㅤ• For each transaction carried out with XGC, 2% of this amount is withdrawn from the **coin reserve**, then **burned**.
ㅤ• During 7 years, every 4 months, **9 trillion** of XGC will be burned from the **coin reserve**, totaling a burn of 90% of the supply in this period.

• Decreasing the supply of currencies on the market generates a constant currency appreciation.

0.NAME: 1st Phase
0.VALUE:
{stateEmj} {timestamp}

• Official launch worth `{value, number, .0000000000}` on Txbit.io and Uniswap brokers.

1.NAME: 2nd Phase
1.VALUE:
{stateEmj} {timestamp}

• Official launch on the P2PB2B.IO broker, an exchange that moves more than 1 billion dollars a day!

2.NAME: 3rd Phase and 1st Coin Burning
2.VALUE:
{stateEmj} {timestamp}

• Official presentation of X7 Exchange.

• X7 Exchange comes with the objective of contributing to the advancement of the universe of digital currencies, facilitating the access of users of the social network Xiglute to the vast universe of cryptocurrencies, NFTs, DeFi and the Metaverse.

• Check out some of our advantages that are being presented and others that are being developed:
ㅤ• Login integrated with the social network Xiglute
ㅤ• Free inter-user transfer
ㅤ• Marketplace system support
ㅤ• Dynamic staking
ㅤ• Airdrops
ㅤ• Faceuts

• 9 trillion [XGC cryptocurrencies burned]({etherscanURL}).

3.NAME: 4th Phase
3.VALUE:
{stateEmj} Stand-by / in development

• Integration with Xiglute Social Network and X7 Exchange broker, usability of XGC within the network for purchases and transfers.

• XCOIN App, the XGC in the palm of your hand!
ㅤ• Balance, transfers, access to imported products and the exclusivity to sell your products through the XGC currency!

• Advantages:
ㅤ• Manage your own business, earn income and access 24h support.
ㅤ• Encrypted Information, Privacy, Anonymity and Security.
ㅤ• Purchase and sale of products and services with cryptoactives.

5.NAME: Mega Update XGC

6.NAME: Mega Update X7
6.VALUE:
{stateEmj} {timestamp}

 • Official launch of the X7 Exchange App on the Google Play Store.

8.NAME: 5th Phase
8.VALUE:
{stateEmj} Second semester of 2022

• Launch of a new brokerage that moves over `{amount, number, ::compact-short}` dollars per day.

9.NAME: 4th Coin Burning
9.VALUE:
{stateEmj} August 2022

• 9 trillion XGC cryptocurrencies will be burned.

10.NAME: 6th Phase
10.VALUE:
{stateEmj} 2023

• The beginning of a new era, launching in one of the largest brokers in the world.
